title: Plant nanobiotechnology: a new strategy to enhance crop photosynthesis
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EN00520A, Critical Review
Jiahao Liu, Dan Zhang, Linfeng Bao, Tingyong Mao, Linbo Zhao, Chan Liu, Guanjun Huang, Yun long Zhai
In crops, photosynthesis is the basis of biomass accumulation and yield formation. With the ever-increasing global population and the increased need to meet the food demand, the ability to increase...
